name: From The Roof
description:
This is a survival game about an unstable life, people and a little bird. The dove, being in the center of events, continues to be an observer, but his life will also change.

Controls:

1) Keyboard:
Movement - Arrows (left and right) & AD;
Rise up - Space & W & Arrow up;
Platform Descent - S & Arrow Down;
Interact - E;
Pause - Ecs.

2) Gamepad:
Movement- Left Stick & D-pad;
Raise Up - Left Stick Up & D-Pad Arrow Up & Button Southl;
Platform Descent - Left Stick Down & D-Pad Arrow Down;
Interact - Button West.
